channel.title: Electric Vehicles (EVs) on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Electric Vehicles (EVs) on FinanClub

item.title: STLA
item.description: score:6 Chances: Stellantis is offering a 14.5% wage hike to UAW, which may help mitigate the risk of a potential strike. The company plans to expand its battery capacity, positioning itself for growth in the EV market. Stellantis is exploring the use of e-fuels, demonstrating its commitment to sustainable and alternative technologies.

item.title: VFS
item.description: score:25 Chances: VinFast Auto gained significant attention and experienced a massive rally in August, indicating investor interest in the company’s potential. The Vietnamese EV maker, VinFast, has made its U.S. debut, signaling its expansion into international markets, which could offer growth opportunities. VinFast’s successful business combination with Black Spade Acquisition Co.
